map.subtitle: Un aperçu complet de toutes les catégories, sous-catégories et sujets

banner.title: Paramètres des cookies
banner.description: Nous utilisons des cookies pour améliorer votre expérience, analyser le trafic du site et personnaliser le contenu. Vous pouvez gérer vos préférences à tout moment.
banner.rejectAllAria: Refuser tous les cookies non essentiels
banner.closeWarning: Fermer sans faire de choix refusera tous les cookies non essentiels.

settings.title: Préférences des cookies
settings.description: Choisissez les cookies que vous souhaitez autoriser. Vous pouvez modifier ces paramètres à tout moment depuis le pied de page.
settings.closeWarning: La fermeture sans enregistrement sera considérée comme un rejet de tous les cookies non essentiels.

necessary.name: Cookies nécessaires
necessary.description: Ces cookies sont essentiels au bon fonctionnement du site web. Ils permettent des fonctionnalités de base telles que la navigation dans les pages et l'accès aux zones sécurisées. Le site web ne peut pas fonctionner correctement sans ces cookies.

functional.name: Cookies fonctionnels
functional.description: Ces cookies mémorisent vos préférences et paramètres, tels que la sélection de la langue et le thème, pour vous offrir une expérience plus personnalisée.

analytics.name: Cookies analytiques
analytics.description: Ces cookies nous aident à comprendre comment les visiteurs utilisent notre site web en collectant et en rapportant des informations anonymes. Cela nous aide à améliorer les performances et l'expérience utilisateur du site web.

marketing.name: Cookies marketing
marketing.description: Ces cookies sont utilisés pour suivre les visiteurs sur les sites web et afficher des publicités personnalisées. Ils nous aident à mesurer l'efficacité de nos campagnes marketing.

topSites.title: Meilleurs Sites
topSites.subtitle: Liste organisée des meilleurs sites web pour chaque sujet
topSites.selectTopic: Sélectionnez un sujet pour voir les meilleurs sites
topSites.noLinks: Aucun site disponible pour ce sujet pour le moment

meta.title: Meilleurs Sites Spirituels & Ésotériques - Oxyness
meta.description: Découvrez les meilleurs sites spirituels et ésotériques, soigneusement sélectionnés et classés par sujet. Trouvez des ressources fiables pour la méditation, la métaphysique, la divination, la guérison énergétique et plus encore.

advisors.title: Conseillers Spirituels
advisors.subtitle: Découvrez des conseillers spirituels et des médiums de confiance du monde entier
advisors.noResultsMessage: Essayez d'ajuster vos critères de recherche ou revenez plus tard

meta.title: Cookie Policy - Oxyness
meta.description: Learn about how Oxyness uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience and protect your privacy. GDPR-compliant cookie policy with detailed information about all cookies we use.

introduction.title: What are cookies?
introduction.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, smartphone, or tablet) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide a better user experience. Cookies help websites remember your preferences, settings, and browsing behavior.

why.title: Why we use cookies
why.content: At Oxyness, we use cookies to:
reasons: Remember your language preference so you don't have to select it every time
Remember your theme preference (light or dark mode) for a comfortable browsing experience
Store your cookie consent choices to respect your privacy preferences
Maintain your browsing session for security and functionality
Improve our website by understanding how visitors use it (with your consent)

categories.title: Cookie categories
categories.intro: We categorize cookies based on their purpose and ask for your consent where required by GDPR regulations.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. You cannot opt-out of these cookies as they are strictly necessary for providing services you have requested.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your language preference or theme choice. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we use on our pages. If you do not allow these cookies, some or all of these services may not function properly.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us understand which pages are most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.

marketing.title: Marketing/Advertising Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites. They do not store directly personal information but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device.

details.title: Detailed cookie list
details.intro: Below is a complete list of all cookies currently used on Oxyness:

cookies.name: cookie_consent
cookies.purpose: Stores your cookie consent preferences to remember which cookie categories you have accepted or rejected
cookies.data: JSON object with consent preferences (functional, analytics, marketing), timestamp, and version number

cookies.name: user_session
cookies.purpose: Stores session data when functional cookies are not consented, including theme preference for the current browsing session

cookies.name: theme
cookies.purpose: Remembers your theme preference (light or dark mode) across browser sessions

cookies.name: locale
cookies.purpose: Remembers your language preference across browser sessions

details.note: All cookies listed above are first-party cookies, meaning they are set directly by Oxyness and not by any third-party services.

manage.title: How to manage your cookie preferences
manage.intro: You have full control over which cookies we use. Here's how you can manage your preferences:

settings.title: Cookie Settings on Oxyness
settings.description: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the 'Cookie Settings' button in the footer of any page. This will open our cookie consent banner where you can:
actions: Accept or reject all cookies at once
Customize your preferences by category (Necessary, Functional, Analytics, Marketing)
View detailed information about each cookie category
Save your preferences and apply them immediately

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.description: You can also manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:
actions: Receive notifications when cookies are set

links.intro: For instructions on how to manage cookies in your browser, please visit:

browser.warning: Please note that blocking all cookies may affect your ability to use some features of our website.

rights.title: Your rights and privacy
rights.intro: Your privacy is important to us. Under GDPR regulations, you have the following rights:

items.title: Right to be informed
items.description: You have the right to clear, transparent information about how we use cookies (this policy)

items.title: Right to control
items.description: You have the right to choose which non-essential cookies to accept or reject

items.title: Right to withdraw consent
items.description: You can withdraw your consent for functional, analytics, or marketing cookies at any time through Cookie Settings

items.title: Right to access
items.description: You can request information about what data is stored in cookies

rights.privacy: For more information about how we handle your personal data, please read our Privacy Policy.

updates.title: Updates to this Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our use of cookies or changes in legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by:
methods: Displaying a prominent notice on our website
Updating the 'Last updated' date at the top of this policy
Requesting renewed consent if required by law
updates.recommendation: We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:
contact.response: We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days as required by GDPR.
